summary: This give you all the dragonplate and dragonscale weapons and armor.
descriptionHtml:
This give you:
- Dragonplate Boots
- Dragonplate Armor
- Dragonplate Gauntlets
- Dragonplate Helmet
- Dragonplate Shield
- Dragonscale Boots
- Dragonscale Armor
- Dragonscale Gauntlets
- Dragonscale Helmet
- Dragonscale Shield

[color=#FFFF00]Installation:[/color]

- Drag the file to your Skyrim Folder.

[color=#FFFF00]Uninstall:[/color]

- Just delete the file.

[color=#FFFF00]How To Use:[/color]

- Load your game and open the console, then type: bat alldragon
